Text:
This tea is one of my favorites. It has a clean, subtle, delicious flavor very similar to the Stash White Decaf Lemon, but unlike the lemon it's lemongrass free, which can be important for people with grass allergies.

Three warnings for this tea:

1. If you like strong tea, you're in the wrong place. This is a subtle white. I find it delicious, but many of my friends want a stronger flavor. I think this is comparable to flavored water in the intensity of the flavor, though it would be unfair to compare this to the fake chemical flavor of a propel water bottle!

2. It's a white tea. It steeps FAST. If you'd like more flavor, choose another tea or put in 2-3 teabags. This tea will not always forgive a long steep and can become very bitter if left too long.

3. It's not a very good iced tea. It tastes like it would be lovely, but the flavor oil leaves a film on the top that I find unappetizing.

Enjoy your tea!
